content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like it, may appear harder as it is.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like this contribution because it uses loops in an easy way. Having the first row to have a fixed amount of '*' and the bottom row to have an N amount of '*' makes if just focus on the middle rows.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This clash is interesting and also easy.
Additionally, this clash helps beginners to solve in a quick time, therefore, I think that it is a good contribution : )

Goal
* You misspelled "triangle" as "trianle".

* The statement should be more detailed. Suggest to rewrite as follows:

Given an integer [[N]], you must create a right triangle pattern of [[N]] rows. Each row [[i]] should be of length [[i]]. The first and last rows should be filled with {{*}}, while the intermediate rows should have {{*}} at the beginning and end, with spaces in between.

Output
* Please add "<<[[N]] rows>>:" in front of the description.

* Please format "*" as a {{constant}} and remove the quotation marks.

Thanks.
